segments.text: That's really convenient . We were wondering if you could take a little off the rent , though .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can take two thousand off . That'll make the rent twenty-eight thousand .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's great . Every little bit counts . And we don't need the parking space . I guess we could rent it out .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , for at least three thousand per month .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That'll bring the price down to twenty-five . That's the price we were shooting for .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm glad . Now , there's a deposit fee of two month's rent .
segments.speaker: S2
